Energy_Transfer.help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Energy_Transfer.shortHelp: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Knockback

Overload.help: You can Overload your Energy Aura and dramatically improve your defense to all attack types except Psionic Attacks. Overload also grants you high resistance to Defense Debuffs. This Energy Aura is so powerful, that it can even absorb some damage, effectively increasing your Max Hit Points, However, when Overload wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
Overload.shortHelp: Self +DEF(All but Psionics), +Recovery, +Max HP, Res(DeBuff DEF), +Special

Nova.help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Nova.shortHelp: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback, Self -Recovery

Entropy_Shield.help: Your Defense to Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Fire, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks is increased. The shield also makes you resistant to Knockback, Repel, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilization, Defense Debuffs and enemy Teleportation for as long as you can keep this toggle power active.
Entropy_Shield.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), +Res(Knockback, Repel, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Teleport, DeBuff DEF
